# Freedom (Spell)
## Overview
[[Abjuration Spells|Abjuration]]

**Level:** [[9th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 9]], [[9th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 9]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 17th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 17]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels) or see text

**Target:** One creature

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** Will negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 287

The subject is freed from spells and effects that restrict movement, including *[[Binding (Spell)|binding]]*, *[[Entangle (Spell)|entangle]]*, grappling, *[[Imprisonment (Spell)|imprisonment]]*, *[[Maze (Spell)|maze]]*, paralysis, petrification, pinning, *[[Sleep (Spell)|sleep]]*, *[[Slow (Spell)|slow]]*, stunning, *[[Temporal Stasis (Spell)|temporal stasis]]*, and *[[Web (Spell)|web]]*. To free a creature from *[[Imprisonment (Spell)|imprisonment]]* or *[[Maze (Spell)|maze]]**,* you must know its name and background, and you must cast this spell at the spot where it was entombed or banished into the *[[Maze (Spell)|maze]]*.
